arts.ttl: Aston Villa 1-0 Bologna: McGinn's early strike secures a much-needed win for Emery
arts.sum: In the opening exchanges of the encounter, the first chance came to the hosts, who haven’t scored at Villa Park since their 2-0 triumph over Tottenham in May. Evann Guessand, who signed with the club in August, drove into the box after a timely pass from Morgan Rogers. The other two changes saw Pau Torres, who won the 2021 Europa League instalment, play his third game of the season, with Ian Maatsen also coming into the starting XI.
